verses.verse: וְהָ֣אָדָ֔ם <WH120> ve-Ha-'a-Dam, And Adam יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> ya-Da' had אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַוָּ֣ה <WH2332> chav-Vah Eve אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> ish-To; his wife וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> vat-Ta-har and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and gave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קַ֔יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin, Cain וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and said קָנִ֥יתִי <WH7069> ka-Ni-ti I have gotten אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- from יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַתֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> vat-To-sef And she again לָלֶ֔דֶת <WH3205> la-Le-det, bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָחִ֖יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv his brother אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֑בֶל <WH1893> Ha-vel; Abel וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- become הֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH1893> he-vel And Abel רֹ֣עֵה <WH7462> Ro-'eh was a keeper צֹ֔אן <WH6629> Tzon, of sheep וְקַ֕יִן <WH7014> ve-Ka-yin but Cain הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become עֹבֵ֥ד <WH5647> 'o-Ved was a tiller אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> 'a-da-Mah. of the ground

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi came מִקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz And in process יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; of time וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought קַ֜יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin it came to pass that Cain מִפְּרִ֧י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri of the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah of the ground מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> min-Chah an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְהֶ֨בֶל <WH1893> ve-He-vel And Abel הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> he-Vi also brought גַם־ <WH1571> gam- his part ה֛וּא <WH1931> hu he מִבְּכֹר֥וֹת <WH1062> mib-be-cho-Rot of the firstlings צֹאנ֖וֹ <WH6629> tzo-No of his flock וּמֵֽחֶלְבֵהֶ֑ן <WH2459> u-me-chel-ve-Hen; and of the fat וַיִּ֣שַׁע <WH8159> vai-Yi-sha' had respect יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, thereof And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הֶ֖בֶל <WH1893> He-vel unto Abel וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and מִנְחָתֽוֹ׃ <WH4503> min-cha-To. and to his offering

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about קַ֥יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin But unto Cain וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and מִנְחָת֖וֹ <WH4503> min-cha-To and to his offering לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no שָׁעָ֑ה <WH8159> sha-'Ah; he had not respect וַיִּ֤חַר <WH2734> vai-Yi-char wroth לְקַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> le-Ka-yin And Cain מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, was very וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> vai-yip-pe-Lu fell פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> pa-Nav. and his countenance

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to קָ֑יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin; unto Cain לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why חָ֣רָה <WH2734> Cha-rah Why art thou wroth לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְלָ֖מָּה <WH4100> ve-Lam-mah Why נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> na-fe-Lu fallen פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha. ;and why is thy countenance

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo not אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If תֵּיטִיב֙ <WH3190> tei-Tiv thou doest well שְׂאֵ֔ת <WH7613> se-'Et, will not be lifted וְאִם֙ <WH518> ve-'Im and if לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תֵיטִ֔יב <WH3190> tei-Tiv, well לַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> lap-Pe-tach at the door חַטָּ֣את <WH2403> chat-Tat sin רֹבֵ֑ץ <WH7257> ro-Vetz; lieth וְאֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> ve-'e-Lei-cha and תְּשׁ֣וּקָת֔וֹ <WH8669> te-Shu-ka-To, And unto thee [shall be] his desire וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you תִּמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> tim-shol- and thou shalt rule בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer talked קַ֖יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin And Cain אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- with הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> He-vel Abel אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; his brother וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בִּהְיוֹתָ֣ם <WH1961> bih-yo-Tam came בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, and it came to pass when they were in the field וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom rose up קַ֛יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin that Cain אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הֶ֥בֶל <WH1893> He-vel Abel אָחִ֖יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv his brother וַיַּהַרְגֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2026> vai-ya-har-Ge-hu. and slew him

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to קַ֔יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin, unto Cain אֵ֖י <WH335> 'ei Where הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> He-vel [is] Abel אָחִ֑יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha; not [Am] I my brother's וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, I know הֲשֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> ha-sho-Mer keeper אָחִ֖י <WH251> 'a-Chi my brother's אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> 'a-No-chi. He

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said מֶ֣ה <WH4100> meh What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta; hast thou done ק֚וֹל <WH6963> Kol ;the voice דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> de-Mei blood אָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha, of thy brother's צֹעֲקִ֥ים <WH6817> tzo-'a-Kim crieth אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai about מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> Ha-'a-da-Mah. unto me from the ground

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now אָר֣וּר <WH779> 'a-Rur And now [art] thou cursed אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah from the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which פָּצְתָ֣ה <WH6475> pa-tze-Tah which hath opened אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּ֔יהָ <WH6310> Pi-ha, her mouth לָקַ֛חַת <WH3947> la-Ka-chat to receive אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּמֵ֥י <WH1818> de-Mei blood אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother's מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> mi-ya-De-cha. from thy hand

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki When תַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> ta-'a-Vod thou tillest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, the ground לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will no תֹסֵ֥ף <WH3254> to-Sef it shall not henceforth תֵּת־ <WH5414> tet- yield כֹּחָ֖הּ <WH3581> ko-Chah unto thee her strength לָ֑ךְ Lach; נָ֥ע <WH5128> na' a fugitive וָנָ֖ד <WH5110> va-Nad and a vagabond תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. shalt thou be in the earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said קַ֖יִן <WH7014> Ka-yin And Cain אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] greater עֲוֹנִ֖י <WH5771> 'a-vo-Ni My punishment מִנְּשֹֽׂא׃ <WH5375> min-ne-So. than I can bear

הֵן֩ <WH2005> hen Behold גֵּרַ֨שְׁתָּ <WH1644> ge-Rash-ta Behold thou hast driven me out אֹתִ֜י <WH853> 'o-Ti הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, this day מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> me-'Al and from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the earth וּמִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> u-mip-pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶסָּתֵ֑ר <WH5641> 'es-sa-Ter; shall I be hid וְהָיִ֜יתִי <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ti and it shall come to pass נָ֤ע <WH5128> na' and I shall be a fugitive וָנָד֙ <WH5110> va-Nad and a vagabond בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the earth וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כָל־ <WH3605> chol and whoever מֹצְאִ֖י <WH4672> mo-tze-'I [that] every one that findeth me יַֽהַרְגֵֽנִי׃ <WH2026> Ya-har-Ge-ni. shall slay me

וּלְשֵׁ֤ת <WH8352> ul-Shet And to Seth גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu to him יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> yul-lad- also there was born בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> Ben, a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and he called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH583> e-Noosh; Enos אָ֣ז <WH227> 'az Then הוּחַ֔ל <WH2490> hu-Chal, then began men לִקְרֹ֖א <WH7121> lik-Ro to call בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> be-Shem upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD פ Peh
